Block.Text: {C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Then I guess you've got a way to go before you can be considered a real Warlord.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}Hey, don't be like that! I wasn't making fun of you.{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}Tell you what, I'll teach you how to make new allies, all right? My name's {Color:32}Keiji{Color:33}, by the way.{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Just come to {Color:31}Ignis{Color:33} Castle when you're ready to learn!{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}Hey there, you two!{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh, that's right! I was going to teach you how to make new allies. Well, it's pretty easy...{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Not all Warriors are part of an army, you see.{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}There are plenty of free Warriors around as well, ones that are unattached.{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}For example... Um... Ah, I know! Go and have a look in that {Color:32}Cave{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}There's probably one or two in there. Start by seeing if you can recruit them.{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}Hm? Me? Nah. I'm a bit of a free spirit, so I'm not keen on staying in one place for too long.{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}And anyway, I've got some things I need to buy in the {Color:32}Shop{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}See you later, {Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...He's gone.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Where did he tell us to go again? The {Color:32}Cave{Color:33}, was it?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}|02,cc{C1}! It looks like there are some Warriors in here!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0059}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}So you want me to join you, eh?{End}
{C1}{Char:0059}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Well, you're going to have to show me what you can do first!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Defeat this Warrior within 4 turns!{End}
{C1}{Char:0062}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Are you here in search of allies, perhaps?{End}
{C1}{Char:0062}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Hm? Would I like to join you? I suppose if you were to impress me sufficiently...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0059}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Oh, it's you again!{End}
{C1}{Char:0059}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}If you want me to join you, you're going to have to show me what you can do!{End}
{C1}{Char:0062}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Ah, so we meet again.{End}
{C1}{Char:0062}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Hm? Would I like to join you? I suppose if you were to impress me sufficiently...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You can recruit free Warriors by{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}defeating them in 4 turns,{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}defeating them using a supereffective move,{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}or defeating them without any of your allies suffering damage.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}There are, however, some free Warriors who can only be recruited by fulfilling certain other special conditions.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Our army is growing nicely. I think things are looking up, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}Hmph. Feeling pretty happy with yourself, huh?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Oh!{Wait:30}20 You again...{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I hope you're not resting on your laurels just because you've conquered {Color:31}Ignis{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Because {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33} is surrounded by other kingdoms...{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}And there's still {Color:30}Greenleaf{Color:33} and {Color:30}Fontaine{Color:33} to go.{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You know, the Warriors of {Color:31}Ignis{Color:33}... They mostly used Fire-type Pokémon, right?{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Strong against Grass, weak against Water...{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Heh. Everybody knows that, of course.{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Anyway, I hear that the Warlord of {Color:30}Greenleaf{Color:33} uses Grass-type Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}What are you two talking about? I don't understand any of this!{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You know, I don't think the Warlords of either {Color:30}Greenleaf{Color:33} or {Color:30}Fontaine{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}have any interest in trying to conquer other kingdoms.{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I reckon now's your chance to make a move.{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}Come on. We don't have time to stand around here chatting.{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}We've got to get to the {Color:32}Ponigiri Shop{Color:33} and increase our Pokémon's Energy.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}It sounds like there's just no way of avoiding battle...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You are now able to challenge the Warlords of {Color:30}Greenleaf{Color:33} and {Color:30}Fontaine{Color:33} to battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The more kingdoms you conquer, the more places you'll be able to travel to.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You'll meet new Pokémon, too. And each kingdom will have all sorts of interesting new locations to visit.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Select a castle belonging to {Name}{C1}'s army to command your Warriors to move.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You won't send me off on my own anywhere, will you?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I'd like to stay with you, |02,cc{C1}, if that's all right.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Fontaine{Color:33} is home to lots of Water-type Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Fire-type Pokémon might find it hard...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}But Grass-type and Electric-type Pokémon should be really useful!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Kingdom of {Color:30}Fontaine{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You wish to challenge me in battle... And what might your name be?{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}So you are {Name}{C1}...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I'd heard that {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33} had a new Warlord...{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}But I always thought that we would meet on the battlefield in {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33}, not here.{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Well, never mind. A battle is a battle, no matter where it takes place.{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Ha...{Wait:30}20 You're back, are you, {Name}{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Fine. We will do battle once more!{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You won fair and square. The kingdom of {Color:31}Fontaine{Color:33} is yours.{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}But even though my castle is lost, my Pokémon will never leave me.{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Together, we will continue to resist the tides of fate.{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}You're too soft...{Wait:30}20 That's your fatal flaw...{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You must fight, {Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}For your present...{Wait:30}20 And for your future...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}So the Warlord of {Color:30}Greenleaf{Color:33} uses Grass Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}That means our Fire-types should shine!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Water-types will be in for a long, hard battle, though...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Kingdom of {Color:30}Greenleaf{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Hmm... {Wait:30}20You're the new Warlord of {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33}, aren't you?{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:34}I've heard a lot about you... But I didn't expect you to be this young.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I suppose you need a bit of youthful energy in this rough old world.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Maybe it's time for my generation to call it a day...{End}
{C1}{Char:0088}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:30}Motonari{Color:33}! How can you say such a thing?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0089}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Our army would fall apart without your wisdom, Lord {Color:30}Motonari{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}Whew... No rest for the wicked, eh?{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}I suppose I'd better do what's expected of me...{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Aha, {Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}...Here for another battle, are you?{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}Well, I'll say it again... No rest for the wicked...{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}I knew the day would finally come when I'd face defeat on my own battlefield.{End}
{C1}{Char:0088}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:30}Motonari{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Surely now I can be left in peace?{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You are a more worthy Warlord for {Color:31}Greenleaf{Color:33} than I, {Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}I ask only that you take good care of my beloved kingdom.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}That's enough for today.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Perhaps now you can leave me in peace for a while?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}Oh. |02,cc{C1}...{Wait:30}20 Congratulations...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}You've heard the stories too, haven't you, |02,cc{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}The legendary Pokémon who is said to appear before the one who conquers all the kingdoms...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}The truth is that...{Wait:30}20right now...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}Ransei is on the brink of destruction...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Far to the north of Aurora...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}A certain {Color:34}Warlord{Color:33} had set out on the road to conquest.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}His name was Nobunaga...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}His stated aim was to conquer all of the kingdoms{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}and destroy {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}If {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} is trying to destroy Ransei,{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}he probably wants to use the power of the legendary Pokémon to do so.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}So...{Wait:30}20 I think we should find this legendary Pokémon before {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} does!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}That way, we can save Ransei!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}...Luckily, {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}'s reach doesn't extend this far south yet.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:30}Pugilis{Color:33}, {Color:30}Violight{Color:33}, and {Color:30}Chrysalia{Color:33} are the three kingdoms that are nearest to us.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Each of their Warlords is famed far and wide for their courage and strength.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}If we could get them to join us, our army would be truly formidable...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You are now able to challenge the Warlords of {Color:30}Pugilis{Color:33}, {Color:30}Violight{Color:33}, and {Color:30}Chrysalia{Color:33} to battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}We're up against some pretty fearsome opponents this time...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Pugilis{Color:33}, especially, is full of Fighting-type Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}They might be too strong for Normal-type Pokémon like {Color:31}Eevee{Color:33} and {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}And I have a feeling these Warlords might try invading our kingdoms, too...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}If we don't station Warriors to defend our castles, we could be in trouble...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Just be careful, all right?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}! One of our kingdoms doesn't have any Warriors stationed there!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Just think if the enemy were to invade now, |02,cc{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}There are lots of Fighting-type Pokémon in {Color:30}Pugilis{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Normal-type Pokémon like {Color:31}Eevee{Color:33} and {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33} will need to be careful.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Normal-type Pokémon will need to be careful.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}I just wish we had some Flying-type or Psychic-type Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Kingdom of {Color:30}Pugilis{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}{Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I've been waiting for you.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Waiting? What do you―?{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}The so-called Warlords of this area are pathetic weaklings.{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Invading their kingdoms would be no fun at all.{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Something does seem to be kicking off in the north... But that's still far away.{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}And now you're here.{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I think this could be the most fun I've had in years!{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Oh! Back again, are you?{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}And after such a crushing defeat last time...{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Still, I'm glad to see you!{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Phew...{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}You are a worthy winner.{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}But this is all part of the rich tapestry of battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Victory tastes all the sweeter once you have known the bitterness of defeat.{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Anyway, congratulations. You won a battle that will be talked about for years to come.{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I like it when the odds are against me...{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}But you have to overcome those odds, or it's no fun.{End}
{C1}{Char:0008}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Aren't you getting tired of losing all the time?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}We did it, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Look, |02,cc{C1}, isn't that...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}Hey, it's you again! Never thought I'd see you here...{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What do you think of this kingdom, then?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Well, it's quite far from {Color:31}Aurora{Color:33}... And there are lots of Pokémon here that we've never seen before.{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}There sure are! You should {Color:32}link{Color:33} with some of them and make them your partners!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...!{Wait:30}20 B-But we have {Poke}{C1} and {Color:31}Jigglypuff{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Sure... But don't you want to try getting to know some other Pokémon?{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Everyone's got their own perfect partner...{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}By which I mean a Pokémon with whom you can form a {Color:32}Perfect Link{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}R-Really...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Just remember that the number of Pokémon partners you can have depends on your {Color:32}Capacity{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Anyway, I recommend you give some other Pokémon a try while you're here!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Pokémon that live in the wild are called wild Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Wild Pokémon who have an affinity for a certain Warrior will be indicated by a ⅝ or ⅜ mark above their heads.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Those with an especially strong affinity will be indicated with a ⅛ mark.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Try and find the perfect partner for every one of your Warriors!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Move adjacent to a wild Pokémon, and you will be able to select ⅕.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}You... We keep bumping into you...{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Looks like you've captured a lot of kingdoms now...{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Surely you're not trying to run them all by yourself?{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}B-But |02,cc{C1} is the Warlord, the leader of our army...{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Being a Warlord is about more than just doing battle, you know.{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Now, you can choose what goes on in your kingdoms in your absence...{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Or instead, you can {Color:32}delegate{Color:33} control of a kingdom to another Warrior.{End}
{C1}{Char:0036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:31}It's got to be {Color:32}training{Color:33}! That's the best way to spend your time!{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Tsk. I think {Color:32}searching{Color:33} for Warriors and Pokémon is more important.{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Much more important!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}Ha! You two never think ahead.{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}You won't get anywhere unless you {Color:32}develop{Color:33} your army.{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}...But it's up to you, of course. Just be sure to give it some thought!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Select a castle that contains an allied Warrior to {Color:32}delegate{Color:33} the day-to-day running of your kingdom.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Violight{Color:33} is a kingdom ravaged by thunderstorms... Perhaps that's why there are so many Electric-type Pokémon here.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}It's a tough place for Water-type and Flying-type Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Ground-type Pokémon are the best choice...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}But Grass-type Pokémon are also pretty strong against electrical attacks.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Kingdom of {Color:30}Violight{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}So you're {Name}{C1}, are you?{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Hmm. I was wondering what you'd be like... And I have to conclude that you're no match for me and my {Color:30}Shinx{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Ha... {End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}What's wrong?{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You. You're a child.{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Talking like that to a Warrior before you've even done battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Fine!{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I'll stop talking and demonstrate my power on the battlefield instead!{End}
